titleStmt.title: A copie of Sir William Wallers letter, &c. A great victorie obtained by Sir Wjlljam Waller, and Lievtenant-Generall Cromvvell, against Colonell Sir James Long, (High Sheriffe of Wiltshire) who was driven from the Devizes, and his whole regiment taken, being the same horse that conducted the Prince from Oxford to Bristoll. Where were taken Colonell Long, the high Sheriffe. The Under-Sheriffe. Eight captains. Seven cornets. [double brace] Foure hundred horse. Three hundred forty armes. Three hundred prisoners. Goring pursued by Sir VVilliam VValler. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Waller, William, Sir, 1597?-1668.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March: 18th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
